participant_1.background:
I'm not good at keeping up with my exercise routine, but I know it's important for my health.
I drive my ford f150 at night to avoid being afraid of the dark.
i love christmas.
i am considered a nerd by many.
i graduated college and immediately went to graduate school.

participant_2.background:
I used to live in a small town in the Midwest.
i have trouble getting along with family.
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby.
i enjoy playing computer games.

content.text: Doing well, thanks! How are you?
Pretty good! I'm a bit tired because I was up late last night watching Christmas movies.
Oh, I love Christmas movies! What was your favorite one?
I think it's a tie between Elf and Home Alone. I love the humor in both of them.
Those are both great movies! I also really like The Santa Clause.
That's a good one too! I love the whole "Tim Allen plays Santa" thing.
Me too! It's so funny. What are some of your other favorite Christmas traditions?
I love decorating the tree and listening to Christmas music. I also love baking Christmas cookies with my family.
Those are all great traditions! I love baking Christmas cookies too. What's your favorite kind of cookie to make?
I love making sugar cookies! They're so easy to decorate and they always taste delicious.
Sugar cookies are my favorite too! I love putting frosting and sprinkles on them.
Me too! I think Christmas cookies are the best part of the holidays
